alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel; Prince Georges (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 5:51PM EDT until May 22 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN ANNE ARUNDEL AND NORTHEASTERN PRINCE GEORGES COUNTIES... At 551 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Severna Park, or near Riviera Beach, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Bowie, Severn, Annapolis, College Park, Crofton, Greenbelt, Beltsville, Riviera Beach, Naval Academy, Baltimore-Washington Airport, Magothy River, Dobbins Island, Severn River, Pinehurst, Gibson Island, Sillery Bay, Bodkin Point, Fort Smallwood State Park, Glen Burnie and Severna Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
